description: Schema for storing and using family data
title: Family

___countryOfOrigin.description: Country in which the family original live
___countryOfOrigin.title: Country Of Origin

___commonDiagnosis.description: List of ontology IDs of common diagnosis for the family
___commonDiagnosis.title: Common Diagnosis

___additionalInformation.description: List of Additional information of the family
___additionalInformation.title: Additional Information

___hpoIdInDiagnosis.description: List of HPO ID for the disease
___hpoIdInDiagnosis.title: HPO ID(s)

___specificMutationsGenotypedMethod.description: Method by which specific mutations genotyped
___specificMutationsGenotypedMethod.title: Specific Mutations Genotyped Method

___race.title: Race
enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

___otherPMIDs.description: List of other PMIDs having evidence about the family
___otherPMIDs.title: Other PMIDs

___affiliation.description: The affiliation this evidence is associated with.
___affiliation.title: Affiliation

___label.description: An user entered label for the family
___label.title: Label

___active.description: boolean switch to set if the family avaliable for curation.

___moiDisplayedForFamily.title: What mode of inheritance does this family display

___pedigreeLocation.description: If pedigree provided in publication, indicate location
___pedigreeLocation.title: Location of Pedigree in Publication

___reasonExplanation.description: Reason for including LOD or not
___reasonExplanation.title: Explanation

___estimatedLodScore.description: In case no published LOD score
___estimatedLodScore.title: Estimated LOD Score

___sequencingMethod.description: Sequencing method associated with the segregation LOD score
___sequencingMethod.title: Sequencing Method
enum: Exome/genome or all genes sequenced in linkage region

___numberOfUnaffectedWithoutBiallelicGen.title: Number of UNAFFECTED Individuals without the Bialletic Genotype

___lodRequirements.title: Does the family meet requirements for estimating LOD score for EITHER autosomal dominant/X-linked or autosomal recessive?

___numberOfAffectedWithGenotype.title: Number of AFFECTED Individuals with Genotype

___lodPublished.description: Is there a LOD score published?
___lodPublished.title: LOD Score Published

___numberOfAffectedWithTwoVariants.description: Number of affected with 2 variants or homozygous
___numberOfAffectedWithTwoVariants.title: # Affected with 2 Variants/Homozygous

___numberOfSegregationsForThisFamily.title: Number of Segregations Reported for This Family

___probandAssociatedWithBoth.description: If > 1 variant, is proband associated with both
___probandAssociatedWithBoth.title: Is Proband Associated with Both

___assessments.description: List of assessments added from different curators
___assessments.title: Assessments

___hpoIdInElimination.description: List of HPO IDs eliminated from the disease
___hpoIdInElimination.title: HPO ID(s) Eliminated

___numberOfMale.description: Count of Male in the family
___numberOfMale.title: Number of Male

___termsInElimination.description: Non-HPO terms (separated by comma) eliminated from the disease
___termsInElimination.title: Non-HPO term(s) Eliminated

___ageRangeType.description: Type of age range in family
___ageRangeType.title: Type of Age Range

___individualIncluded.description: List of individuals included in the family
___individualIncluded.title: Individual Included

___numberOfFemale.description: Count of female in the family
___numberOfFemale.title: Number of Female

___termsInDiagnosis.description: Non-HPO terms (separated by comma) for the disease
___termsInDiagnosis.title: Non-HPO term(s)
